<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Charred Remains](/Feats.aspx?ID=2559) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 103 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

Your next fire spell leaves embers in its wake. If your next action is to Cast a Spell with an area and the [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) trait, for 1 minute, your spell's area becomes difficult terrain as well as hazardous terrain, dealing 1 fire damage for each square a creature moves through.
name: Charred Remains
